attributes.title: Hates white ppl
attributes.review: When making an account it only gave options to state race as minorities and that really shows that trump hates white people... disappointment. Also after using i got brain cancer and my doctors made a correlation so ...

attributes.title: Like what’s the point?
attributes.review: This was a pathetic app on The App Store. In his time, he was weak & gave away everything to everybody - so bad for the USA. Also got the “weapons of mass destruction” totally wrong, and you know what that mistake cost us? Sad! Only negative questions asked.

attributes.title: Apps are cool ✨🧚🏻but not everything should be turned into an app✨🧚🏻
attributes.review: The balding orange cheeto has an app, for what reason tho? To brainwash more of his followers. The audacity the cheeto has to prey on the weak minded. I was appalled to see all the fake news on this app even  tho trump hates fake news. The irony☺️

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: absolutely horrifying. when opening the app for the first time i was greeted with the most horrendous looking creature i have ever seen- words couldn’t even describe it. i wouldn’t want my enemy to be put through that misery. ONE STAR.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I can’t believe it when I opened the app I saw a Cheeto puff then it came through my screen and attacked me! After that it fed me oranges??? Not to mention I am allergic !!! The Cheeto puff laughed in my face and I had to be rushed to the hospital can’t believe that happened....

attributes.title: Oh LORD
attributes.review: I legitametily thought this a game to smash Doritos but was TERRIFIED to see an ORANGUTAN in my presence. No where did it say that a horror game was involved! I threw my phone across the room. When I grabbed it...IT WAS STILL THERE. So I do not reccomend this “game” to anyone. Please hide your children from the BEAST that goes by the name of “President”.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: It literally took forever to download the app and the content is not helpful at all. I wanted to be informed on important things happening like the COVID pandemic and the BLM protest, but the only thing I could see was an orange old man everywhere 🤦🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: Thank you for the app and all that you do 🙏🏼

attributes.userName: vc ann vc gjj by Gmail
attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review:
Finally we have an app to support our president!
I love it,and is fellow Americans will surely love it too.

attributes.title: Crashing
attributes.review: The app kept crashing. It crashed every time I opened it, so I didn’t even get a chance to look through it. Will never download this app again.
